PIC32CX-BZ Zigbee API Reference
Data Fields
ZDO_SimpleDescResp_t Struct Reference

This command is generated by a remote device in response to a Simple_Desc_req directed to the remote device. This command shall be unicast to the originator of the Simple_Desc_req command. More...

#include <zdo.h>

Data Fields

ShortAddr_t nwkAddrOfInterest
 NWK address of the simple descriptor request.
uint8_t length
 Length in bytes of the Simple Descriptor to follow.
ZdpSimpleDescriptor_t simpleDescriptor
 The simple descriptor itself.

Detailed Description

This command is generated by a remote device in response to a Simple_Desc_req directed to the remote device. This command shall be unicast to the originator of the Simple_Desc_req command.
